类 Card

Card

    • Card

      public Card(Card.Suit suit, int rank)
      Constructs a Card with the given suit and rank.
      参数:
      suit - the suit of the card
      rank - the rank of the card
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the rank is out of range

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Card other)
      Compares this card to another card based on their ranks.
      指定者:
      compareTo 在接口中 Comparable<Card>
      参数:
      other - the card to be compared
      返回:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this card is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified card
